questions.explanation:
Lawyer.

	When George meets Cheryl in the beginning of this episode, he says that he's the only funny guy in the group (despite the fact that Jerry is a comedian).  She ends up giving him her number and they date.  Jerry suggests that he and Elaine go along with them on a date to take some of the pressure off of George, but George says no.

questions.text: Where does Babu get a job in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Monk's Restaurant.

	Once again, Jerry decides to help Babu, this time by getting him a new job and an apartment.  Jerry basically ruined Babu's life in the season three episode, "The Café" when he ended up telling Babu to make changes to his restaurant.

Florida.

	Kramer ends up at a Baseball Fantasy Camp in the beginning of this episode, but he returns home early because he ended up punching Mickey Mantle.  Since Kramer was at the camp, Elaine has been picking up Jerry's mail.

questions.text: What is the name of the restaurant that George takes Cheryl to?
questions.explanation:
Isabella's.

	At Monk's, Jerry says he doesn't want to go to Isabella's because it's too trendy, so George decides to go there because Jerry and Elaine won't appear.  Eventually, they do appear and George gets angry.

questions.text: How is Cheryl related to Ping?
questions.explanation:
She's his cousin.

	When Elaine asks Cheryl a legal question, Cheryl quickly realizes that Elaine is the one her client is suing in her next trial.  During the dinner, George gets angry because Elaine and Jerry are too funny, so they decide to be really dull.

questions.text: What position did Kramer play in baseball before he punched Mickey Mantle?
questions.explanation:
Pitcher.

	When Kramer returns home, he tells his story about how he was forced to leave the camp and Elaine says that Cheryl convinced Ping to drop her lawsuit.  At this point, the gang hears Babu down the hall.

questions.text: Where does Jerry find Babu's visa renewal form?
questions.explanation:
In his mail.

	While Elaine was picking up Jerry's mail, the mailman put Babu's important documents into Jerry's mailbox by mistake.  Since Babu couldn't receive his forms, he was taken away by the government.

questions.text: According to George, Jerry's life revolves around Superman and which other thing?
questions.explanation:
Cereal.

	After talking to Jerry, Cheryl tells George that she's attracted to Jerry because he's dark and disturbed.  George goes into his story about how he told Jerry and Elaine not to be funny so that he would look good in front of her, but Cheryl decides to leave him.

Pakistan.

	Although Cheryl said that she could help Babu with his immigration problems, George left her on a bad note and no action was taken.  Babu's brother comes to his apartment, but Babu is already back in Pakistan.

questions.text: Elaine's lawsuit is dropped in the end of the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	After George told the story to Cheryl, Cheryl thought that Elaine and Jerry were liars, so she doubled the damages and decided to defend Ping in court.  Kramer decided to go to Mickey Mantle's restaurant to beg for forgiveness, but they threw him out.
